Options

Autorun

Colors

When enabled, Autorun will have the extension run automatically whenever you visit a new page.


When enabled, this option will make the extension apply highlights of varying colors to text on the page.

Paragraph Mode

Custom Font

If Paragraph Mode is enabled, the extension will alter text per-paragraph, rather than per-sentence. The effect is most apparent when colors are enabled; colors will change with paragraphs, not sentences.

Choose the typeface that the extension will apply to text. The options include a number of fonts research has shown to be good for dyslexics.



Font Size

Line Spacing

When on, font size naturally changes the size of text. Automatic sets the size to a default value, while custom uses the size set with the slider.


Line Spacing lets you change how much distance is between each line. Automatic sets the spacing to a default value, while custom uses the value set with the slider.

Padding

Text Width

Padding changes the distance between text and the edges of the highlights (if enabled). Automatic for the default padding change, Custom for the slider. Warning: setting the slider too high may make text unreadable!

Setting Text Width to Condensed will make the extension horizontally compress text, so it no longer runs the entire length of your screen.
